div.h3: ActiveMQ In Action is Now Available in Print and E-Book!
div.p: The ActiveMQ In Action book has now been fully released in both e-book and in print – get your own copy today!

ActiveMQ In Action, the definitive guide to master ActiveMQ is now available in print and ebook. ActiveMQ in Action starts from the anatomy of a JMS message and moves quickly through connectors, message persistence, authentication, and authorization. By following a running example (a stock portfolio app), you’ll pick up the best practices distilled by the authors from their long and deep involvement with this technology. Every Manning Publications print book purchase includes a complimentary ebook which comes in three formats: PDF, mobi, and epub when available.
